name: Office Fight - Beta
description:
Physics-Based Office Mayhem

Office Fight is a silly fight sim poorly disguised as a puzzle/sandbox arcade game.

You have been overworked and underappreciated by your employer; Mega-corp. Now the company is restructuring and you have been made redundant.
The news kills you. Literally. But your ghost has unfinished business… Revenge!

Armed with the power to haunt ordinary office equipment, you must launch it on a path of destruction! Cause havoc, and start epic ragdoll brawls between co-workers, all in the name of vengeance!

Features:

  • Office Destruction is the aim of the game. Get those bodies rolling and enjoy the carnage.
  • Physics and awkward tumbles will leave you giggling and wanting more.
  • Custom characters and tweakable stats for you to enjoy. Maybe recreate your co-workers?
  • Runes for replay value! Get creative with your destruction!
